root.name: Triptych
root.description: OverviewTriptych is a falling block puzzle game, in the mold of Tetris or Super Puzzle Fighter. Blocks drop down from the top of the screen, and the player must align them so that groups are formed of like-color blocks. But instead of being held to a rigid physics system and unmoving blocks, the pieces are malleable, and can be bounced, squished, and stacked in an irregular manner. Several games with similar physics systems to Triptych can be downloaded for numerous phones.
